definitions.definition: Any plant of the genus Ephedra of gymnosperm shrubs .
A stimulant derived from the plant Ephedra sinica used in traditional Chinese herbal medicine and in over-the-counter weight-loss aids.

main_definition: Any plant of the genus Ephedra of gymnosperm shrubs .
secondary_definitions: A stimulant derived from the plant Ephedra sinica used in traditional Chinese herbal medicine and in over-the-counter weight-loss aids.
